hero.title: From Data Science to
hero.subtitle: Bringing Dutch tech standards and design aesthetics to Albanian businesses. I help non-technical business owners get found online - including through ChatGPT searches.

story.title: My Journey: From Numbers to Beautiful Websites
story.paragraph1: My story begins in data science and analytics - a non-technical background that taught me to see patterns, understand user behavior, and make data-driven decisions. Living in the Netherlands' thriving tech ecosystem, I witnessed firsthand how advanced technology transforms businesses.
story.paragraph2: But I also developed an eye for beauty and design aesthetics. I realized that powerful technology means nothing without elegant presentation. When I moved between the Netherlands and Albania, I saw a massive gap: Albanian businesses deserved the same world-class digital standards I experienced in Dutch tech companies.
story.paragraph3: Today's reality is exciting: AI costs are plummeting, making advanced technology accessible to everyone. My clients are already being discovered through ChatGPT searches because their websites are properly optimized. You don't need a physical storefront to generate leads when you have a professional online presence.
story.paragraph4: I created this service specifically for non-technical business owners who need affordable, professional solutions. No €5,000+ quotes. No complex technical jargon. Just beautiful, functional websites that work.
story.conclusion: Democratizing Dutch tech standards for Albanian businesses - one website at a time.

transparency.title: Data-Driven Transparency
transparency.description: My analytics background means everything is measurable and transparent. You see exactly what you're paying for and the results you're getting.

partnership.title: Tech Made Human
partnership.description: I translate complex technology into simple solutions. You get Dutch tech standards with personal, Albanian hospitality.

efficiency.title: AI-Powered Efficiency
efficiency.description: Using AI tools and automation, I deliver faster results at lower costs - savings I pass directly to you.

focus.title: Leveling the Playing Field

comparison.title: Why Choose WebBuilder?
comparison.subtitle: Compare the real costs and see the difference

q1.question: What if I need more than 5 pages?
q1.answer: Additional pages can be added for $10/month per page. Most small businesses find 4-5 pages sufficient for their needs.

q2.question: Can I cancel anytime?
q2.answer: Yes, there are no long-term contracts. You can cancel with 30 days notice. Only your domain stays with you - website hosting and files are not included after cancellation.

q3.question: What if my domain costs more than $15/year?
q3.answer: You'll pay the difference. Most .com domains are around $12-15/year, but premium domains may cost more.

q4.question: Do you work with e-commerce sites?
q4.answer: For simple product catalogs, yes. For full e-commerce with shopping carts, that would be a custom project with different pricing.

q5.question: What happens to my website if I cancel?
q5.answer: You keep your domain only. The website hosting, files, and content are not included after cancellation - only the domain registration remains yours.

q6.question: How many monthly updates do I get?
q6.answer: Reasonable monthly updates are included - typically 1-2 hours of work per month. Larger changes may incur additional fees.
